activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!
activities.markdown_message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!

activities.message: Thank you for your report. We have reproduced the crash and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3514
activities.markdown_message: Thank you for your report. We have reproduced the crash and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3514

activities.message:
Thanks again for your report. It appears this issue was resolved in the following commit: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/6ea26aafd5a2d64987bd1607f9212f6ce494765c

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so you'll hear from us again soon.

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so you'll hear from us again soon.
